experience.title: Research Internship : Operations research
experience.description: • Optimised the COVID-19 vaccine supply chains through a two-stage linear programming model using IBM CPLEX Optimization software • Built a Linear Programming Model to predict the optimal number of stations and allocation to demand group• Used CPLEX to built a two-stage linear programming model for Optimising Cost, Traveling Distance simultaneously• Completed vaccination phase-1 for 40 sectors at cost of INR 4.6 L ( including distance, fixed, salary)cost in 4 days• Formed allocation matrix of vaccination station to sector and team and optimal days for completion

recommendations: Shauvik Purkayastha “I highly recommend Gurjot for his exceptional work and thought process during his internship with us. He consistently demonstrated strong analytical skills, critical thinking, and attention to detail. Gurjot is a dedicated and talented individual who would be a valuable asset to any organisation seeking an analytical thinker.Furthermore, Gurjot consistently exhibited strong attention to detail, ensuring the accuracy and reliability of his analytical findings. He demonstrated exceptional organizational skills, effectively managing multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines and maintaining high-quality standards. His meticulousness and commitment to excellence were evident in every deliverable he produced. In addition to his technical proficiency, Gurjot proved to be an excellent team player and collaborator. He actively participated in group discussions, sharing his insights and ideas constructively, and demonstrated a remarkable ability to communicate complex analytical concepts in a clear and concise manner. His positive attitude, adaptability, and willingness to learn from others made him a valuable asset to our team dynamic. Overall, Gurjot surpassed our expectations as an Analytics Intern, consistently delivering outstanding work that demonstrated his intellectual capabilities, dedication, and analytical acumen. It is evident that he has a bright future ahead in the field of analytics, and I have no doubt that he will excel in any endeavor he chooses to pursue.”
